title: Mayor Explains Why He Changed City Named After Slave-Owning Founder To Salami Town
description: The post Mayor Explains Why He Changed City Named After Slave-Owning Founder To Salami Town appeared first on The Onion.
author: The Onion Staff
text: Libra (September 23 to October 22): You’ve heard the advice thousands of times every week since you were a child, but today is the first time you will finally embrace the words “shut the fuck up.”
html:
Libra

(September 23 to October 22):

You’ve heard the advice thousands of times every week since you were a child, but today is the first time you will finally embrace the words “shut the fuck up.”
